------- **2018 Coupon Code** ----------

Use **LET25VRT** coupon at checkout and receive **25% lifetime discount**. This coupon is available for all [VPS](https://www.virtono.com/ssd-openvz-vps) and [VDS](https://www.virtono.com/ssd-kvm-vps) services from [www.virtono.com](https://www.virtono.com) website, for the whole month of December!

--------------------------------![]()

**Description**


Payment Options: PayPal, online Credit Card, Skrill, Bitcoin (Bitpay), Bank Wire Transfer

4 Server Locations : **Bucharest, RO** - **Manchester, UK** - **Amsterdam, NL** - **Frankfurt, DE**

We are proud to announce that we have developed a brand-new high-performance Cloud Infrastructure in Manchester-UK, Frankfurt-DE and Amsterdam-NL.  
 
Top features for our new Cloud infrastructure includes: 

1. raid protected storage( & clustered filesystem) 
2. multiple 10Gb networks 
3. new hypervisors with better CPUs and high amounts of memory.

Besides the hardware upgrade, you will notice new features like: internal ip (private network) , ssh keys, upload your own iso (for kvm - vds) and improved interface. We are also working on a new backup system which will be available soon as well. 

We are working on upgrading Bucharest-RO as well(so private network and clustered filesystem is not available here yet) and  building a new Cloud Infrastructure in Miami-FL-USA that will be available soon.

------------------

Bellow you will find our offers for LET users. The prices are in Euros, so here is today's exchange rate: 1 Euro = 1.25 U.S. dollars ($7=€5.61)
